class.name: VerticalMetadataEntity
class.comment: Storage of meta-information about a profile measurement. These are the orientation (height/depth) and name of the depth/height value as they should be named in the output and the unit of the depth/height value. A value_profile must be defined for each dataset containing profile data.

column.name: orientation
column.comment: The "orientation" of the vertical values as integer. 1 => above verticalOriginName and -1 => below verticalOriginName

column.name: vertical_origin_name
column.comment: The vertical origin name of the vertical values, e.g. water surface

column.name: vertical_from_name
column.comment: The name of the vertical from values, e.g. from or depthFrom

column.name: vertical_to_name
column.comment: The name of the vertical from values, e.g. to or depthTo

column.name: fk_vertical_unit_id
column.comment: The unit of the vertical value, e.g. m

column.name: fk_value_profile_id
column.comment: Reference to the value_profile table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: vertical_origin_name
column.comment: Locale/language specific vertical origin name of the vertical metadata entity

column.name: vertical_from_name
column.comment: Locale/language specific verticalTo name of the vertical metadata entity

column.name: vertical_to_name
column.comment: Locale/language specific verticalTo name of the vertical metadata entity
